item.description:
The Hide Away
@ Anthony's
105 Canal St
Malden, MA 02148

DISCO PARTY this Saturday. ALL 70's & 80's music.

Every Saturday Night is Ladies Night: (10 min from Boston)

Come and enjoy a night of dancing and a chance to meet some very nice women.

DJ MURPH will be mixing all 70's & 80's music ONLY so get your dancing shoes on.

SUMMER TIME: We move the party outside to our spacious patio, that can accommodate over 500 women, were we dance underneath the stars till 1:30 am.

• ATM
• Hi-Def TV (Sports Channels)
• Fire Place
• Premium Liquor
• (FREE FOOD)
• OUT DOOR POOL TABLES (coming soon)
• 2 Parking Lots (FREE)
• $7.00 Cover charge
• Hours 8:00 p.m. to 1:30 a.m.
• 5 minute WALK from Malden T-Station
item.name: DISCO PARTAYYYYYYYY all 70's & 80's music
